mapper.select: SELECT c.CARTID AS cartId, i.COLORIMG AS COLORIMG, i.COLORNAME AS colorName, i.SALESPRICE AS SALESPRICE, it.ITEMNAME AS itemName, ci.itemdtlid AS itemdtlId, SUM(ci.QUANTITY) AS totalQuantity, SUM(ci.QUANTITY * i.SALESPRICE) AS totalPrice FROM cart c, cartItem ci, itemDtl i, item it WHERE c.CARTID = ci.CARTID AND ci.ITEMDTLID = i.ITEMDTLID AND i.ITEMID = it.ITEMID AND c.CUSTOMERID = #{customerId} AND ci.STATUS = #{status} GROUP BY c.CARTID, i.COLORIMG, i.COLORNAME, i.SALESPRICE, it.ITEMNAME, ci.ITEMDTLID HAVING SUM(ci.quantity) > 0 ORDER BY i.COLORIMG
